desc: Handmade small batch ceramics by Kentia Naud from her studio in Alberta, Canada. Rustic / extravanglantly chic functional pottery. Transfer ware and printed clay. Embedded crystals, vintage elements, and gold.

layout.text:
Shabby chic, rustic, gold, crystals, vintage finds.
Mind ideas turned into functional art, using earth elements through my hands and heart.
Welcome to this parallel world of mine. 
Next restock: Date TBA in 2021!
- Kentia Naud
